title: Bogdan Straton
text:
Bogdan Straton (born 23 August 1983) is a <a href="Romania">Romania</a>n <a href="football%20%28soccer%29">football</a>er who currently plays as a <a href="Midfielder">defensive midfielder</a> for Bradul Borca.
Club career.
Politehnica Iaşi.
In July 2011 Straton joined <a href="FC%20Politehnica%20Ia%C8%99i%20%282010%29">Politehnica Iași</a> on a two-year deal. At the end of the season, CSMS finished second in table and gained promotion to <a href="Liga%20I">Liga I</a>, in part due to Straton's performances.
